actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent, and to authorize the production of documents by, a Subcommittee of the Committee on Governmental Affairs in the case of United States v. Eugene Robert Wallach, et. al.

summary.text: Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the Subcommittee on Oversight of Government Management in the case of United States v. Eugene Robert Wallach, et al. Authorizes the Chairman and Ranking Minority Member of such subcommittee to produce documents in such case to the extent deemed necessary.

titles.title: A resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent, and to authorize the production of documents by, a Subcommittee of the Committee on Governmental Affairs in the case of United States v. Eugene Robert Wallach, et. al.
